tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Maya is extremely professional yet friendly 
She always explains about the treatment before starting treatment in terms of setting expectations 
During treatment while we are wondering what‚Äôs happening she provides timely updates 
I along with my family always goes to Dr Vora Dental Clinic at Mulund and Dr Maya is always one of the most favourite Doctor that we book the appointment 
Sometimes it‚Äôs challenging to get her appointment as all the appointments are always gets booked but that tells us how professional she is and that‚Äôs why everyone prefers booking her appointment 

Thanks a Lot Dr Maya

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Maya Nair is well competent in her job. She has the patience to deal with customers which is very paramount. Without asking her for any details she voluntarily discussed and explained overall hygiene to be maintained, how to brush the teeth etc. Small details but very important.
She encouraged and gave me the courage to continue with the treatment quote ‚Äú Don‚Äôt get scared it is normal we are all there for you‚Äù . Very happy with her confident at the same time concern and care . üëçüòäüíØ

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had my root canal treatment done by Dr Mira Nair and Dr Archana I never expected that it will be done in such a nice manner.I have my health issues so I was little scared but both the Doctors did it in a very nice manner by clearly explaining each and every point in a very nice manner.I will surely recommend Dr Vora s Dental Clinic for everyone.
Thanks

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Naman had examined my teeth and explained the issue and treatment for the same very nicely. Dr. Maya cleaned the teeth without feeling pain during the process. Completed the treatment in 3 sittings. 
The staff is very cooperative. Waiting period is also very less.
Overall,  a good and very clean clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I am satisfied with the  treatment  provided by the  dental hospital. In other words,I did not observe  any  pain or discomfort.The doctor was very kind,compassionate and joyful.Wish her successful career.....
           With regards, 
              ST Mahadik

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great experience. My 80 year old Father is undergoing treatment at Dr. Vora's Dental Care. Dr. Maya is quite thorough in explaining the finer details of the treatment, steps involved, approximate time interval between visits and that builds a good trust level between Doctor and Patient. Openness and transparency is key and I think she is doing a great job. We look forward to the subsequent visit.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had lot of pain and sensitivity in my front tooth Dr Maya not only explained me about my cavity but also gave me a nice treatment,she applied some temporary medicine since we have a root canal treatment next day. That temporary medicine have gave me a great relief.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I always had an issue visiting a dentist out of fear of pain and discomfort. Ever since Dr. Maya started treating me I dont think twice before scheduling a visit. She always looks after my comfort and she is very patient with my grumpy behavior. Explains everything in details and explains over and over to my hearts content. Dr. Vora's clinic is extremely organized and clean spotless. I have been their patron for past 10 yrs and so is my family and not once we had to ever wait. Their time management is simply amazing. Even their receptionist is very polite always with a smile and takes her job very seriously. All in all Dr. Vora's clinic makes your dentistry experience smooth and comfortable.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
The doctor is very friendly and her explaining system was v.good .I also like the precautionary measures taken for corona and appreciable. Overall everything found systematic .moreover the treatment was not painfull. I think best dentist in Mulund we got. 
Only one thing which I think u should provide to the patient is summary of his all visits and treatment given as well as what prescription given and x-ray copy by email. So at a later stage or in future he/she should know what kind of treatment taken earlier.

Else everything fine
